queries.update: insert into FE_EPWR_CHARGE ( INLO_NO, YYYY_MM, KEPCO_CHARGE, REG_USER_NO, REG_DTM, CHG_USER_NO, CHG_DTM ) with datas as ( select a.INLO_NO as INLO_NO , b.PAY_YYYYMM as YYYY_MM , b.TOTAL_PRICE as KEPCO_CHARGE , 1 as REG_USER_NO , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as REG_DTM , 1 as CHG_USER_NO , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as CHG_DTM from FE_EPWR_INLO a , KEPCO_PP_EPWR_PRICE b where a.KEPCO_PP_ID = b.KEPCO_PP_ID and b.PAY_YYYYMM = $yyyymm ) select a.* from datas a on duplicate key update KEPCO_CHARGE = a.KEPCO_CHARGE , CHG_DTM = a.CHG_DTM
queries.insert:
insert into FE_EPWR_CHARGE /* 전기요금테이블 */ ( INLO_NO /* 설치위치번호 */ , YYYY_MM /* 년월 */ , EPWR_PRICE_ID /* 전기요금ID */ , BASIC_PRICE /* 기본요금단가(원/kW) */ , CNTRT_EPWR /* 계약전력(kWh) */ , BASIC_CHARGE /* 기본요금(BASIC_PRICE * CNTRT_EPWR) */
, USED_AMT /* 사용량(kWh) */ , PEAK_USE_EPWR /* 최대사용전력(kWh) */ , PEAK_USE_DTM /* 최대사용일시 */ , USED_CHARGE /* 사용요금 */
, POWER_FACTR_CHARGE /* 역률요금 */
, REG_DESCR /* 등록설명 */ , REG_USER_NO /* 등록사용자번호 */ , REG_DTM /* 등록일시 */ , CHG_USER_NO /* 수정사용자번호 */ , CHG_DTM /* 수정일시 */ ) with datas as ( select a.INLO_NO as INLO_NO , $yyyymm as YYYY_MM , sum(USED_AMT) as USED_AMT , sum(USED_CHARGE) as USED_CHARGE , max(a.PEAK_USE_EPWR) as PEAK_USE_EPWR , count(1) as CNT from FE_EPWR_CHARGE_TIME a , FE_EPWR_INLO b where a.YYYYMMDDHH >= concat($yyyymm, '0100') and a.YYYYMMDDHH <= concat($yyyymm, '3124') and a.INLO_NO = b.INLO_NO group by a.INLO_NO ) , a as ( select a.INLO_NO as INLO_NO , a.YYYY_MM as YYYY_MM , b.EPWR_PRICE_ID as EPWR_PRICE_ID , b.BASIC_PRICE as BASIC_PRICE , b.CNTRT_EPWR as CNTRT_EPWR , b.BASIC_PRICE * b.CNTRT_EPWR as BASIC_CHARGE , a.USED_AMT as USED_AMT , a.PEAK_USE_EPWR as PEAK_USE_EPWR , ( select max(PEAK_USE_DTM) from FE_EPWR_CHARGE_TIME t1 where t1.YYYYMMDDHH BETWEEN concat($yyyymm, '0100') and concat($yyyymm, '3124') and t1.INLO_NO = a.INLO_NO and t1.PEAK_USE_EPWR = a.PEAK_USE_EPWR ) as PEAK_USE_DTM , a.USED_CHARGE as USED_CHARGE , 0 as POWER_FACTR_CHARGE , concat('1H datas=', CNT) as REG_DESCR , 1 as REG_USER_NO , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as REG_DTM , 1 as CHG_USER_NO , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as CHG_DTM from datas a , V_PLANT_EPWR_PRICE b where a.INLO_NO = b.INLO_NO ) select * from a ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE EPWR_PRICE_ID = a.EPWR_PRICE_ID , BASIC_PRICE = a.BASIC_PRICE , CNTRT_EPWR = a.CNTRT_EPWR , BASIC_CHARGE = a.BASIC_CHARGE , USED_AMT = a.USED_AMT , PEAK_USE_EPWR = a.PEAK_USE_EPWR , PEAK_USE_DTM = a.PEAK_USE_DTM , USED_CHARGE = a.USED_CHARGE , POWER_FACTR_CHARGE = a.POWER_FACTR_CHARGE , REG_DESCR = a.REG_DESCR
